detaileddescription.para: A function to get the range of valid indices that can be used to index this field.

parameterdescription.para: The field whose indices are of interest.

detaileddescription.para: A function to get the range of valid indices that can be used to index a set of b-splines that are compatible with this spline builder.
A helper function to get a modifiable field from a FieldMem without allocating additional memory.
A helper function to get a constant field from a FieldMem without allocating additional memory.
